SENT.plain: Moyamoya syndrome has occasionally been seen in association with Down syndrome

We report a child with moyamoya syndrome and Down syndrome who was admitted with repeated episodes of strokes; his magnetic resonance imaging and magnetic resonance angiography findings confirmed the presence of occlusive cerebrovascular disease with basal collateral vessels
His protein C levels were significantly decreased during the stroke
Complete clinical recovery was seen during follow-up
This raises the possibility of a link between protein C deficiency and Down syndrome with moyamoya syndrome
